full_description:
Overview
We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical Business Analyst to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will play a crucial role in bridging the gap between IT and business objectives, ensuring that our projects align with the strategic goals of the organization. This position requires a strong understanding of data analysis, project management, and effective communication skills to facilitate collaboration across departments.
\n
Responsibilities
\n
\n
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements for various projects.
\n
Analyze data using tools such as SQL, R, and VBA to inform decision-making processes.
\n
Design and implement database solutions that enhance operational efficiency.
\n
Utilize ETL processes to extract, transform, and load data from various sources.
\n
Participate in Agile project management methodologies to ensure timely delivery of projects.
\n
Conduct regular analysis of business processes and recommend improvements based on findings.
\n
Create detailed reports and presentations to communicate insights and recommendations to stakeholders.
\n
Support the development of training materials and documentation for end-users.
\n
\n
Qualifications
\n
\n
Proficiency in SQL and experience with database design is essential.
\n
Familiarity with data integration tools such as Talend is preferred.
\n
Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data sets.
\n
Experience in Agile methodologies and project management practices.
\n
Knowledge of VBA for automating tasks and improving efficiency is a plus.
\n
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present findings clearly.
\n
A degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field is preferred.
\n
Previous experience as a Business Analyst or in a similar role is advantageous.
\n
\n
Join us in leveraging data-driven insights to drive business success!
\n
Job Types: Full-time, Internship
\n
Pay: $92,959.00 - $98,706.00 per year
\n
Work Location: In person
